languages.text: "Вон она — гордыня мон-кай. Ты считаешь, что без наставлений элантах погрязнет во тьме. Но душа {mf|его|ее} сияет столь ярко, что разгонит любой мрак, и потому я не страшусь твоих слов".

"There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."
languages.original_text: "Вон она — гордыня мон-кай. Ты считаешь, что без наставлений элантах погрязнет во тьме. Но душа {mf|его|ее} сияет столь ярко, что разгонит любой мрак, и потому я не страшусь твоих слов".

traits.locale_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her}soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her}soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her}soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her}soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “又来了，猴子又开始自以为是了。你以为如果没有你的指引，外界人就会堕入黑暗的泥沼，可实际上，{mf|他|她}的灵魂是如此耀眼，足以驱散一切阴霾。我不会害怕你的威胁。”
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: “又来了，猴子又开始自以为是了。你以为如果没有你的指引，外界人就会堕入黑暗的泥沼，可实际上，{mf|他|她}的灵魂是如此耀眼，足以驱散一切阴霾。我不会害怕你的威胁。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, la voilà. La fierté des mon-keigh. Vous êtes persuadée que sans vous pour {mf|le|la} guider, l'elantach s'égarerait dans les ténèbres. Mais son âme brille de mille feux et dissipe toute obscurité, vos paroles n'ont donc aucun effet sur moi. »
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, la voilà. La fierté des mon-keigh. Vous êtes persuadée que sans vous pour {mf|le|la} guider, l'elantach s'égarerait dans les ténèbres. Mais son âme brille de mille feux et dissipe toute obscurité, vos paroles n'ont donc aucun effet sur moi. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Ahí está el orgullo de los mon-keigh. Crees que {mf|el|la} elantach se perdería en la sombra sin tu guía, pero su alma brilla con tanta intensidad como para desterrar toda oscuridad. No temo tus palabras».
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: «Ahí está el orgullo de los mon-keigh. Crees que {mf|el|la} elantach se perdería en la sombra sin tu guía, pero su alma brilla con tanta intensidad como para desterrar toda oscuridad. No temo tus palabras».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイのプライド。あなたがいなけれエランタは暗闇の中に沈んでしまう。しかも{mf|彼|彼女}の魂はどんな憂いも吹き飛ばすほどに輝いている。だから私はあなたの言葉を恐れない」
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイのプライド。あなたがいなけれエランタは暗闇の中に沈んでしまう。しかも{彼|彼女}の魂はどんな憂いも吹き飛ばすほどに輝いている。だから私はあなたの言葉を恐れない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Da ist er ... der Stolz der Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr glaubt, der Elantach würde in der Dunkelheit umherirren, wenn Ihr ihn nicht führt. Aber seine Seele strahlt so hell, dass sie jede Düsternis vertreibt, daher fürchte ich Eure Worte nicht."
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: "Da ist er ... der Stolz der Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr glaubt, der Elantach würde in der Dunkelheit umherirren, wenn Ihr ihn nicht führt. Aber seine Seele strahlt so hell, dass sie jede Düsternis vertreibt, daher fürchte ich Eure Worte nicht."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her}soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

languages.text: "Mon-keigh kibri böyle bir şey işte. Kılavuzu sen olmasan elantach, karanlığa batar mıydı sence? Ancak onda bir ışık var ki kasvetin her türlüsünü dağıtır. Tehditlerine karnım tok."
languages.original_text: "There it is — the mon-keigh pride. You think the elantach would wallow in darkness without you to guide {mf|him|her}. But {mf|his|her} soul shines so brightly that it will dispel any gloom, and so I do not fear your words."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh kibri böyle bir şey işte. Kılavuzu sen olmasan elantach, karanlığa batar mıydı sence? Ancak onda bir ışık var ki, kasvetin her türlüsünü dağıtır. Tehditlerine karnım tok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
